message: Brick-and-mortar retailers have always used metrics related to the number of items purchased per customer. Units per transaction (UPT) can demonstrate how complete a customer&rsquo;s basket is. In eCommerce, this language is known as the average order value, or AOV.
Sales Conversion Rates (Per Traffic Channel) - When discussing key eCommerce metrics, both agencies and clients often place conversion rates in the top bracket.
